baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼著俗莊嚴具者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 170

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼種種治身。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 204

partialParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，作婦女莊嚴，香塗摩身，波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 177

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼著白衣嚴身具。波夜提(一百六十)。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 160

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼如妓女法著衣。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 205

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼著頭光。波夜提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 166

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼如白衣婦女法著衣。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 206
